data.title: Hotel on Sunset Boulevard in Los Angeles
data.meta_description: Discover the ultimate LA experience – all on a budget! Our boutique hotel on Sunset Boulevard in LA is near Hollywood's most famous landmarks. Book with us today!
data.text:
Hotels on Sunset Blvd. in Los Angeles

Welcome to the most accommodating hotel in Hollywood, L.A. Discover the ultimate LA blockbuster experience – all on an indie film budget.

Travel Update

See our latest policies and procedures in response to COVID-19.

Our hotel on Sunset Blvd. in Los Angeles is ideally situated in the middle of everything LA is famous for. Dunes Inn Sunset offers an affordable Hollywood hotel experience unlike any other. Step into our well-maintained, Spanish-themed, open courtyard surrounded by classic palm trees. Enjoy a tranquil setting with modern amenities including a popular onsite restaurant and bar, Dreams Café.

Family-owned and operated, our hotel is close to all of the major touristic attractions including Downtown LA, Sunset Strip, Silver Lake, Beverly Hills, and Santa Monica, offering an ideal place to stay for international, business and leisure travelers. A stay with us puts you within walking distance of some of the area’s most coveted attractions, such as the Hollywood Walk of Fame, which is less than a mile away!
